tool_description: Merges multiple sets of text chunks while maintaining proper ordering and resolving overlaps or gaps.

chunk_sets.description: Array of chunk arrays to merge

merge_strategy.description: Strategy for merging chunks: sequential, interleaved, or priority_based

resolve_overlaps.description: Whether to automatically resolve overlapping content

error_messages: Empty chunk sets: Provide at least one non-empty chunk set for merging.
Invalid merge strategy: Strategy must be one of [sequential, interleaved, priority_based].
Overlap resolution failed: Unable to resolve overlapping content between chunk sets.
Inconsistent chunk formats: All chunk sets must contain compatible chunk formats.
usage: Provide chunk_sets array and merge_strategy, optionally enable overlap resolution. Returns merged and ordered chunk collection.

merged_chunks.description: Array of merged chunks in proper order
